name: Fill Mat with constant color
description: Analog of simple Fill operation, but can provide better performance if the result should be OpenCV matrix

controls.name: color
controls.caption: Color
controls.description: See supported color formats in "Create constant matrix" function.

controls.name: grayscaleValue
controls.caption: grayscale value
controls.description: Grayscale value is used instead of "Color", if "Color" is an empty string.

controls.name: rawGrayscaleValue
controls.caption: Raw grayscale value
controls.description: If true, grayscale value is "raw" (not normalized), if false, it should be in 0..1 range
